Oklahoma_City.Advanced Science and Technology Educatio: Advanced Science and Technology Education Center (ASTEC) is a science and technology school in Oklahoma City, United States, that was founded in 2000 by the now CEO Freda Deskin. ASTEC is a charter school and one of the first of its kind in the state of Oklahoma. ASTEC's first graduating class was in 2006 with 23 students, all of whom went on to attend college or vocational school.
